document.full_text: one day after bashing three home runs, all carlos beltran could muster was a double. but on a night of breakouts and comebacks, the mets still got their three home runs.
document.title: mets 6, astros 4: mets have another powerful night, but this time others contribute
lines_and_colors: one day after bashing three home runs, all carlos beltran could muster was a double. but on a night of breakouts and comebacks, the mets still got their three home runs.
